page.title: Projects & Applications
page.subtitle: Explore the applications built in this monorepo showcasing different technologies and frameworks

auth.name: Auth Service
auth.description: Custom authentication UI with Ory Kratos integration for login, registration, email verification, and account recovery
auth.shortDesc: Authentication service with social login and SSO

event-cms.name: Event Management Console
event-cms.description: Modern admin dashboard for event management with form templates, user management, and comprehensive UI components showcase
event-cms.shortDesc: Full-featured admin console for event management

event-portal.name: Event Platform
event-portal.description: LINE LIFF-based event management and registration platform with SSG, multilingual support, and QR code ticketing
event-portal.shortDesc: Modern event platform with LINE integration

enterprise-admin.name: Enterprise Admin System
enterprise-admin.description: Enterprise-grade Angular application with RBAC, dual-control approval workflow, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive audit trails
enterprise-admin.shortDesc: Enterprise Angular dashboard with advanced features

vue-motion.name: Vue Motion Library
vue-motion.description: Vue 3 animation effects library showcasing particle systems, GSAP animations, Three.js 3D graphics, and interactive effects
vue-motion.shortDesc: Animation and 3D graphics library for Vue
